long_description: You will own the commute and the bike lane with these gorgeous, bike-specific Evera Fade boots from Merrell. Full-grain leather uppers have reflectivity for safety during your ride. Full-grain leather/pig suede uppers are ready to roll with reflective details for on-bike visibility. Grippy midsole surfaces grab the pedals, and are made for walking once you arrive at your destination. Nylon stability shanks offer efficient pedal push power; lightweight polyurethane midsoles for durability. Microfiber and mesh linings; microfiber and pigskin-wrapped EVA footbeds. Natural enzymes prevent odors from developing before they start for fresh smelling feet. Merrell Evera Fade boots offer durable traction that grips when and where you need it.
short_description: You will own the commute and the bike lane with these gorgeous, bike-specific Evera Fade boots from Merrell. Full-grain leather uppers have reflectivity for safety during your ride.
